servinfo.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine)

s1.ptxt: If vehicle equipped with A/C, remove compressor drive belt before removing water pump belt (1).
Refer to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation (M16A Engine Model) .
Loosen drive belt adjusting bolt (2) and generator pivot bolt (3).
Loosen water pump and generator drive belt adjuster bolt (4) to displace generator and then remove water pump belt.
Install belt (1) to water pump pulley (2), crankshaft pulley (3) and generator pulley (4).
Adjust belt tension by referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Tension Inspection and Adjustment (For M16 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
If vehicle equipped with A/C, install compressor drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation (M16A Engine Model) .
